rows.label: tlk43310142_01_msg0001
rows.name:
These are the barracks
for the Invidian Army.

rows.label: tlk43310142_01_msg0002
rows.name: Are you looking to join up?

rows.label: tlk43310142_01_msg0003
rows.name:
No...from the looks of you,
I'll wager you're mercenaries.

rows.label: tlk43310142_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Must be tough, having to
worry about keeping your
Blades happy all the time.

rows.label: tlk43310142_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I hear you can't even rely on
their support in battle if you
don't accommodate them enough.

rows.label: tlk43310142_01_msg0006
rows.name:
If a Blade's power can't even be
relied upon, wouldn't a properly-trained
soldier make a better partner?
